actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To amend section 3056 of title 18, United States Code, to limit secret service protection of former Presidents when they are traveling to engage in income-producing activities.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit secret service protection, other than on a reimbursable basis, for any former President or family member who is away from his or her domicile and who directly or indirectly obtains income from activities while away.

titles.title: To amend section 3056 of title 18, United States Code, to limit secret service protection of former Presidents when they are traveling to engage in income-producing activities.
